sentences.en: a hotel with a swimming pool and sauna
sentences.cn: 带游泳池和桑拿浴室的旅馆

sentences.en: A sauna is a type of steam bath.
After taking a sauna, you'll feel like a new man.
sentences.cn: 洗了蒸汽浴, 你会感到有如新生一般.

sentences.en: Applicant for bathroom, sauna room, supermarket, stadiums and gymnasiums, office, storage, etc.
sentences.cn: 应用于浴室, 桑拿, 超市, 运动场所, 公司的储物柜.

sentences.en: Can't l have a shvitz in peace in my own sauna?
sentences.cn: 我不能在自己的桑拿浴里享受点和平 吗 ?

sentences.en: City Jinqi wholesale business scope covers hotel supplies, sauna room supplies.
sentences.cn: 金屹城批发市场的经营范围涵盖了酒店用品 、 桑拿客房用品等.

sentences.en: Hotel amenities include coin - operated laundry, pool , spa sauna, tennis court and jacuzzi.
sentences.cn: 旅馆的设施还包括自动投币的洗衣机 、 泳池 、 泉、拿 、 球场和按摩浴缸.

sentences.en: I asked myself: How does this sauna differ from all other saunas?
sentences.cn: 我扪心自问: “这个桑拿和其它的有何不同? ”

sentences.en: I had a sauna this morning, so now I feel really relaxed.
sentences.cn: 我今天早晨去洗了个桑拿浴, 现在觉得很舒坦.

sentences.en: I tried a sauna at the local YMCA to compare.
sentences.cn: 我到附近YMCA的桑拿做比较.

sentences.en: It was really hot in the sauna.
My face is always as red as a beet when I come out of the sauna.
sentences.cn: 每次洗完桑拿,我的脸总是通红.

sentences.en: Sports: including equipment gym, aerobics fitness, water sports, sauna.
sentences.cn: 运动方面包括器械健身 、 有氧课程 、 水中运动 、 男女桑拿.

sentences.en: The hotel has a sauna, solarium and heated indoor swimming pool.
sentences.cn: 这家旅馆有一个桑拿浴室、日光浴室和室内温水游泳池。

sentences.en: The sauna and massage refreshed me after a long walk.
sentences.cn: 走了很长的路之后,桑拿按摩使我恢复了精神.

sentences.en: The stairs separates the rest room from the sauna area.
sentences.cn: 这个楼梯将休息室与桑拿区分开来.

trans.tran_cn: 桑拿浴室，桑拿房，桑拿，桑拿浴，蒸气浴
trans.tran_en: a room that is heated to a very high temperature by hot air, where people sit because it is considered healthy
